text.value: Service user details (the enumerator can answer these questions prior to engaging with respondent)
Where do you store your waste at the household/ premises?
Who is responsible for disposing of waste?
Do you segregate and/ or reuse your waste ?
How do you dispose of your waste?
Waste is collected from your home/ premises directly by a waste service provider
You place your waste at a community collection point
Do you pay your waste collection fees ?
SECTION C: Waste management service satisfaction
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the frequency of collection ?
The waste collection service provider does not come at all
The waste collection service provider comes infrequently
waste collection truck comes at scheduled times but I need additional service
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the equipment the service user uses to collect the waste?
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the behavior of waste collection workers?
Do you know who to go to if you have a complaint about your waste management service provision?
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the community waste collection area?
Do you know who to go to if you have a complaint about your waste management collection area?
SECTION D: Environmental cleanliness service satisfaction
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the cleanliness of the roads around your neighborhood ?
there is generally a lot of litter (plastic bottles, food wrappers, etc.)
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the street cleaning services in your neighborhood?
service is less frequent than necessary
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the cleanliness of public areas and facilities (e.g. public toilets, parks, beaches)?
How clean is the public area ?
Areas and facilities are not cleaned at all
Areas and facilities are not cleaned with necessary frequently
How satisfied or dissatisfied are you with the overall cleanliness of the city?
Too much litter (plastic bottles, food wrappers, etc.)
SECTION E: Litter awareness and opinion
Are you aware of any clean-ups in your neighborhood ?
Would you like to participate in these clean-ups ?
I haven't been told I need to be involved
I don't feel safe doing it,
When you litter, why do you do it?
There was no bin around me to place my litter item
Habit, I always throw my litter
I didn't know littering was not allowed
Why do you think other people litter?
No awareness of the environmental impact of littering
no alternative place to put litter (like bins)
I think the government or private sector should pay for that
I do not litter, so I feel it is unfair for me to pa
Please specify why other people litter
SECTION F: Socio-demographic details of respondent
What is the respondent's role in the household/premisis ?
Any other comments about this feature
Kata gani huko Msimbazi ya chini?

where.mtaa: Fixme: I need this list. What is an MTAA ?
